akn:content.akn:p: § 10755. Authorization of funding Subject to the availability of appropriations, for purposes of carrying out this subchapter, the Attorney General is authorized to award not more than $10,000,000 of funds appropriated to the Department of Justice for these purposes for each of fiscal years 2021 through 2025. (Pub. L. 90–351, title I, § 3055, as added Pub. L. 116–281, § 2(a), Dec. 31, 2020, 134 Stat. 3385.)
